channel.title: Rod Eccles Show | Blog Talk Radio Feed
channel.description: Rod is the coolest, most politically incorrect black man on the planet. Rod has a way of sometimes making Rush Limbaugh look like a Liberal. rodeccles.com Is an original political and society news, commentary and satire site with a Constitutional slant. Rod has always stood for the Constitution of the USA and expresses those views on his site, his blog and his talk show. Catch his talk show NOW ON THE CB MEDIA NETWORK here on Blog Talk Radio (http://www.blogtalkradio.com/cbmedia-network) week nights from 10pm to Midnight Eastern Time USA Monday through Friday. Check out his all new website at www.rodeccles.com. Chat LIVE during the show.

Rod also talks taxes and gives proven tax systems that the USA could adopt and fund all the Constitutional needs of our Federal Government.

item.title: Update on Rod - Sep 03,2010
item.description:
Get facts not fiction or imagination, on the subject of politics and liberty in the United States and across the globe. Rod Eccles is billed as The Coolest, Most Politically Incorrect, Conservative Black Man on the Planet!


Rod does not hold back punches on his daily two hour talk show now heard on Blog Talk Radio and soon on other channels both on the Internet and Terrestrial radio. You can hear his show live Monday through Friday beginning at 10 AM Eastern Time on Blog Talk Radio or on his growing website at www.rodeccles.com.


Rod has been a guest on numerous Internet and Terrestrial talk shows including Back To Basic with Dan Clements; Disentangled Truth with Ameenah Andersen; Breaking The Silence with Ron Mosby; The Ken Pettigrew Show with Ken Pettigrew; and Its A New Day (now called Its Time for Moore) with Micah Sims just to name a few.


What host and listeners like about Rod is that he is honest and genuine which can be rare in this day and age. He is not afraid to be wrong, and will be the first to admit when he is, but more importantly, Rod is not afraid to be right. Time and time again, callers and listeners have found Rod to be right about the subjects in which he engages in discourse.


The passion and love the Rod has for his country, the United States of America, comes across in his show and when he is a guest or guest host. Rod loves the Constitution and believes in the Constitutional Rule of Law which often pits him against even the mainstream Republican Party. He is a fresh voice in a sea of “Stepford Wives” host and personalities. It comes to a surprise to some that Rod is also a African-American.


Rod is available as a guest on your show or at your live public event. Contact Rod now to book him for your show or event. This election season is billed as one of the most important in the history of our nation. Rod is a growing voice that brings a fresh perspective to the audience. That perspective is logical, honest, truthful, colorful and most importantly – just plain RIGHT.


You can listen to the Rod Eccles Show Monday through Friday 10AM to Noon Eastern Time on Blog Talk Radio or on his website at RodEccles.com. You can email Rod to book for your show or event or to get further information at Rod@RodEccles.com.



Rod | Talk shows | Host | Radio | Guest | Conservative

item.title: The Friday, February 26 Edition - Feb 26,2010
item.description:
Due to the Snow, Rain and Wind storm that hit New England, the Rod Eccles Show will not be on the air tonight.  The storm has knocked out electric power and cable service to more than 1, million people and businesses in the New England Region.

We due intend to have the show back up and running on Monday, March 1, 2010.  Be here for a great show to kick off March.

Have a wonderful week end full of freedom and liberty.



Rod Eccles Show | Open Mic Friday
item.content:encoded:
Due to the Snow, Rain and Wind storm that hit New England, the Rod Eccles Show will not be on the air tonight.  The storm has knocked out electric power and cable service to more than 1, million people and businesses in the New England Region.

We due intend to have the show back up and running on Monday, March 1, 2010.  Be here for a great show to kick off March.

Have a wonderful week end full of freedom and liberty.



Rod Eccles Show | Open Mic Friday

item.title: Shows over the Holidays - Dec 18,2009
item.description:
Good day to you all.  There will be no show tonight, Friday, December 18, 2009 due to personal and production issues.  I am sorry for that.  

The holiday schedule will see us off from Thursday, December 24 thru January 2, 2010.  The show will return after the holiday on Monday, January 3, 2010.

Don't forget to tune in to our Christmas show Monday, December 21 thru Wednesday, December 23, 2009.  

Have a Merry Christmas and a very Happy New Year from all of us here at the Rod Eccles Show and Zinc Media, LLC.


Rod Eccles | Show time | holiday | schedule | Christmas | New Year
